Reviews.Title: Nice lightweight, versatile camera
Reviews.Author: Karoly Nikolich "kniko"
Reviews.Content: I just started using this camera and like its features.  Lightweight, yet 12 MP, very easy setup and operation.  the 7x zoom is excellent and the super-macro is amazing.  You can take photos from less than an inch.  The 3-in viewer is crisp and bright, the controls are well positioned and I was able to start using most features without reading the manual.  The in-camera editing is nice and the quality of the images is excellent.  The only thing necessary that is not in the box is a memory card.  You will need a xD picture card (Olympus, Fuji, Sandisk) or a microSD card that fits into the adapter.  Versatile camera, highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: J. Baty
Reviews.Content: One thing I don't like is the way it deletes. This camera is great, I only use one setting which is sport mode. It doesn't need any other setting. Even under the stars in Or. set it on a tripod taking pictures of stars and the moon with the sports mode. I've been off work traveling for almost a year. I've dropped this camera multiply times. Left it on the dash board of my truck. I'm not very good at taking care of cameras, I don't use the case for this one. This camera is a "WOW". The big screen that hasn't scratch yet. The marco and super marco is amazing. I've messed up cameras taking them to the beach but no problems so far. I have an Olympus E-510 and it's trash to me compared to this one

Reviews.Title: Love it, would not marry it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Lar E"
Reviews.Content: Love the resolution, hate the placement of the picture mode wheel. Love the large screen, hate the somewhat sticky delete mode.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: C. Mickiewicz
Reviews.Content: I actually just lost my camera :( and after reading up on other cameras out there, I will be buying the exact same one. The pictures are very clear, the color is nice, battery life is really good, extremely portable, and the videos are pretty good. I read a professional review somewhere that said that if you take a lot of pictures indoors that this camera was not for you. Well, I am no professional but I have taken a LOT of indoor pictures & they all turned out great. In fact, my husband is in Afghanistan for the next year so I have literally taken 100s of pictures of my son over the past 5 months & I have absolutely LOVED the picture quality indoor & out.My one complaint is that picture-to-picture time is a little slow (meaning that you take one picture & it takes a minute to let you shoot another). I also enjoyed the mode where the camera kept shooting as long as you held down the button (so when you flip through the pictures it's like watching a slow-mo video - this allows you to get every single shot), but picture quality was not as good in that mode. I've looked into other cameras in this price range & slightly higher but MANY reviews say that the picture quality is lacking. Even with my few complaints about this camera, picture quality is great & that is why I will be buying it again.I am obviously not a professional, or even close to it, just an average person looking for an easy to use camera with good picture quality. But if you are a professional or someone who really dabbles in photography, you should probably be getting a more expensive camera anyway. For an average joe, and for what you pay, this is an excellent camera!

Reviews.Title: Indestructible
Reviews.Author: Liz M.
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. It is easy to use and takes great pictures.  On a recent family trip it was knocked out of the car, and was found in perfect working condition after being under snow for 6 days.

Reviews.Title: Recommanded..
Reviews.Author: Axaykumar Prajapati
Reviews.Content: Somebody told me, Olympus has a great camera with great finishing result. This was the advice but i have to choose my own.I want camera that have a great features but at affordable prise. I searched too many camera for as per my requirement. and I got this camera's webpage.At first, prise was high, but after sometimes it suddenly dropped. Its panorama feature is totally awesome. and i decided to purchase Olympus stylus 7000.And I'm really satisfied with it. It is light-weighed and has Good battery,  nice effects. these all are good things about that..Now there is just one bad thing that i have experienced is after taking photo, you have to wait sometime to take another.otherwise its easy to use. and recommended by me.

Reviews.Title: Amazon camera buy
Reviews.Author: Marlene
Reviews.Content: This is my third Olympus camera.  First one chewed by new puppy, second one dropped and really destroyed.  This one has lots of features I probably will not use but I am very happy with the features I do use.  The 'Beauty' feature is something else, erasing wrinkles.  Everyone I have showed this feature to have taken down the name of the camera.  I think that would sell the camera alone.  Now if it could also take 10 pounds of the subject ........The only thing I don't like about all three cameras are how cheaply made they seem to be.  But, that seems to be the problem with whatever brand you buy.In all I would recommend this camera and already have.

Reviews.Title: Olympus Stylus Cameras Are Best
Reviews.Author: Erin G. "foureyes"
Reviews.Content: I just bought this camera to replace a camera that was stolen, and have to say that Olympus definitely makes the best cameras. Though many friends and family members have problems with difficult to program and use cameras, I have never had a problem with mine. This camera is lightweight, pretty, and takes an amazingly clear picture. The controls are easy to figure out and I like the software that comes with the camera.The only negatives are you need to buy a memory card separately and the buttons are not made for large fingered people.

Reviews.Title: This camera is a keeper
Reviews.Author: N. Lundquist
Reviews.Content: I have always liked Olympus cameras, but this one is great. I especially like the beauty feature. It automatically beautifies your image. The camera is great and it is a good deal.

Reviews.Title: True Quality from Olympus
Reviews.Author: Dana M Chaney
Reviews.Content: This is my second Olympus camera and it is fantastic.  The display is huge and the pictures are very high quality for the price.  My only regret is the lag time between being able to take pictures.  It isn't very "quick on the draw" but if that is its only imperfection then I am ok with it!

Reviews.Title: a gift
Reviews.Author: mary gale
Reviews.Content: The camera was a gift that was given to a friend who was healing. It was a good price and exactly what I ordered. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Loaded with features
Reviews.Author: Susan M. Ryan
Reviews.Content: This camera has so many settings its hard to know where to begin. I guess I will figure it out eventually. It does not feel overly sturdy. After a week it makes a funny sound when the lens goes in and out. Time will tell

Reviews.Title: Avoid this camera and company
Reviews.Author: Robert Obrien
Reviews.Content: LCD screen broke after extremely limited use.  Was told it was under warranty after reporting the problem to the company.  Told it would cost over $100 to fix after the camera was received by olympus.  Was very rudely told it was my fault and to pay up or shut up.  Total waste of time and a lot of money.  Would avoid this product as the LCD screen is prone to being damaged very easily and you will soon be looking for another camera.

Reviews.Title: Did not honor warranty
Reviews.Author: Richard M. Sullivan
Reviews.Content: Olympus did not honor their warranty when it did not function and I tried to repair. I owned it less than one year.

Reviews.Title: Bad digital camera
Reviews.Author: Patrick Nguyen "Trance Music"
Reviews.Content: I got this today, nothing good about it, color is very bad, comparing with Canon SD790 IS, I will return this tomorrow for sure!
